text: How would you evaluate the impact of these people on the development of [Britain]?
stem: Now we would like to know your opinion about the people from other countries who come to live in Britain - the immigrants.
item: How would you evaluate the impact of these people on the development of [Britain]?

text: Immigrants take jobs away from the British
stem: Please look at the following statements and indicate where you would place your views on this scale?
item: Immigrants take jobs away from the British
answer_cue: Immigrants do not take jobs away from the British

text: Immigrants make crime problems worse
stem: Please look at the following statements and indicate where you would place your views on this scale?
answer_cue: Immigrants do not make crime problems worse

text: Immigrants are a strain on a country's welfare system
stem: Please look at the following statements and indicate where you would place your views on this scale?
item: Immigrants are a strain on a country's welfare system
answer_cue: Immigrants are not a strain on a country's welfare system

text: It is better if immigrants maintain their distinct customs and traditions
stem: Please look at the following statements and indicate where you would place your views on this scale?
item: It is better if immigrants maintain their distinct customs and traditions
answer_cue: It is better if immigrants do not maintain their distinct customs and traditions

text: Here are two statements people sometimes make when discussing the environment and economic growth. Which of them comes closer to your own point of view?

options.label: Protecting the environment should be given priority, even if it causes slower economic growth and some loss of jobs.
Economic growth and creating jobs should be the top priority, even if the environment suffers to some extent.
